name: Minions Battle
description:
Minions.... To your weapons! Take your sniper or M4 and destroy your opponents!

Minions Battle is a 2D deathmatch game. Compete versus your friends or bots on 2 unique maps.

May the best Minion win!



Features:

■ Choice between 3 characters!
■ 5 different weapons!
■ 2 different maps!
■ Multiplayer!
■ Bots !
■ Addictive!
